import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import {Link, useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; import {postPokemon, getTypes} from '../actions/index'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; export default function PokemonCreate(){ const dispatch = useDispatch(); const types = useSelector((state) => state.types); const [input, setInput] = useState({ name:"", health: 0, attack: 0, defense: 0, speed: 0, height: 0, weight: 0, types: [], }) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getTypes()); }, [dispatch]); return(
